title: My Brother
overview: My Brother revolves around Phong's life, Phong is a cold-headed person of an owner of a beverage store chain, from a young age he has lost his mother and lives with his father, Phong has never experienced love,gently from a mother. And one day, God gave him a step mother. But the focus is not on this mother,but it is about Vu. The boy who is warm like the sun this summer melted Phong's icy heart and reverse the daily silent life of phong. And despite trying to deny and trying to hide it but Phong still has to admit that he has feelings for this boy and that love also overcome the brotherhood. What will Phong do when his feelings grow stronger, face with family, lover, public opinion? Will he continue or stop this emotional feeling.
